mapper.select: /* 회원별 상세조회 */ SELECT u.user_id, u.user_pw, u.user_name, u.user_level, u.user_Idcard_number, u.user_addr, u.user_email, u.user_phone, u.user_nick, u.user_sms_check, u.user_email_check, u.static_code, u.user_join_datetime FROM user_manage AS u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: /* 회원가입 */ INSERT INTO user_manage (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_level, user_Idcard_number, user_addr, user_email, user_phone, user_nick, user_sms_check, user_email_check, static_code, user_join_datetime, code_large_type, code_middle_type, latitude, longitude) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userLevel}, #{userIdcardnumber}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userNick}, #{userSmscheck}, #{userEmailcheck}, 'user_status_sc7_1', NOW(), '회원 상태', '정상', #{latitude}, #{longitude});
mapper.select: /* 아이디 중복체크 */ SELECT IF(COUNT(u.user_id) > 0, 1, 0) FROM user_manage AS u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
